Title: Expedites the distributions of funds for the supervision and treatment services for juveniles program
Summary: Expedites the distributions of funds for the supervision and treatment services for juveniles program; requires that eligible municipalities receive the sum equivalent to at least their last approved supervision and treatment services for juveniles program plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to expediting the distributions of funds for the supervision and treatment services for juveniles program
